page.title: 16Work and Play in Millhead
page.content:
Social activity is centred on the Memorial Hall and grounds where Discos, Dances,Bingo and Jumble Sales are held. Pensioners meet here, and a Playgroup for toddlers started in 1985. The main annual event is Children's Sports Day.
The Committee, with Government funded labour costs, have just opened a Tennis Court and almost completed a Bowling Green, reflecting enthusiasm brought by newer families. A Football Team plays in the North Lancs League.
Employment opportunies are few but a slipper factory sends footwear nationwide, and the headquarters of a local family firm remains here, specialising in waste disposal, gas utilisation, demolition and parcel distribution.
